item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, September 22, 2024 at 4:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. ‘Battered and weakened’: Israel deals Hizbollah its worst ever week
2. UK non-doms size up European tax breaks in hunt for fiscal advantage
3. HSBC hit by sixfold surge in Hong Kong property loan defaults
4. [Opinion] Britain and Germany are failing differently
5. [Opinion] Ask Shrimsley: shouldn’t you have fled the country by now?
